owunwa dharmishtakama namathi wishala gas lesa handunwanu labayi.+ eewa yehowa dewi thamata alankarayak gena dena pinisa+ sitewu gasya.+ 4 boho kalayak pura natabun wu than owuhu yali godanangannoya.+ aatha athithaye winasha wu than nawatha sakasannoya.+ parampara gananawakata paluwata gos thibu nuwarawalda owuhu mulumaninma aluth karannoya.+ 5 “obe batalu rala balaganimata wideshikayo paminethi.+ obe kethwathu ha midiwathu wawanne wenath jathinta+ ayath senangaki.+ 6 eheth obawa handunwanu labanne yehowa dewige pujakayan lesayi.+ oba ape dewige sewakayoya.+ oba jathinge sampath bhukthi windinnahuya.+ emagin obata himi wana gaurawaya gana oba mahath prithiyen katha karannahuya.+ 7 oba winda lajjawa wenuwata degunayak aashirwada labannahuya.+ oba nindawata path wenawa wenuwata obata labena urumaya nisa oba prithiyen ipila yannahuya.+ oba jiwath wana deshayedi, ek kotasak nowa kotas dekakma obata himi wanu atha.+ oba sadahatama sathutin kal gewannahuya.+ 8 ‘manda yehowa dewi wana mama yukthiyata priya karami.+ adharmishtakamath sorakamath mama heladakimi.+ mama wishwasawantha lesa owunge kriyawalata sudusu prathipala di+ owun samanga sadahatama pawathina giwisumak athi karagannemi.’+ 9 obage darudariyanwa ha oben pawathennanwa jathin pawa dana handuna ganu atha.+ oba yehowa dewigen aashirwada labu senangak+ bawa obawa dakina siyaludenama therumganu atha.”+ 10 mage dewi wana yehowa nisa mama boho seyin sathutu wannemi.+ manda ohu galawima namathi wasthrayada+ dharmishtakama namathi saluwada mata anduweya.+ pujakayeku men hiswasmak+ palandina manalayeku seda alankara aabharana palandina manaliyaka+ seda ohu mawa sarasuweya. 11 bhumiyen palati hatagannak menda uyane wapura thibena bija dalu lannak menda+ wishwaye palakayanan wana yehowa dewi siyalu jathin idiriye dharmishtakama+ ha prithi prashansa hataganna salaswanneya.+ yesaya 61

ema pradeshaye nidahas sama handa sanwidhanaye pradhana anushasaka dhurayata pathwa yuda samaye uthuru nagenahira pedeswala wipathata path asarana janathawata saha aabadhitha ranawiruwanta upakara kirime wadasatahan kriyathmaka kota ratehi samaya athi kirima udesa sidukala meheya behewin agaya kalayuthu ya. 1999 wasare di pannipitiya shri dewram wehera maha wiharaya aarambha kota anga sampurna wiharasthanayak bawata path kirimata wishala dayakathwayak sapayu unwahanse warthamanaye ema wiharasthanaya kendrakota gena aagamika saha jathika wadasatahan rashiyak sidu kirimata labadena nayakathwaya samage pasasumata lakwiya yuthu ya.
